description: Ideal for inclement days, this down-filled coat is constructed with a storm placket and removable hood for wind and rain protection. Its ripstop fabric is crafted from recycled polyester.
fitting_details: Size Big 2X has a 40½" front body length, a 40" back body length, a 23" shoulder, a 63" chest, and a 38½" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck and changes 1" between sizes.

Size Tall 2L has a 42½" front body length, a 42" back body length, a 23" shoulder, a 63" chest, and a 40½" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck and changes 1" between sizes.
Zip-off drawstring hood with snapped closures at the front. Leather stoppers. Full-zip front with a flap at the top that prevents chafing. Leather zipper pull. Buttoned storm placket.
Long sleeves with elasticized cuffs. Rubber "Polo Ralph Lauren" patch with our signature Pony at the left sleeve.
Two hand-warmer pockets. Two front waist buttoned pockets. Interior left chest pocket. Drawstring waist. Fully lined and filled.
650 fill power. Fill power measures the loft of the down and ranges from 450 to 1,000 for apparel.
Made with recycled polyester, which helps reduce environmental impact by avoiding the use of virgin polyester, a petroleum-based material.
Visit corporate.RalphLauren.com/citizenship-create-timeless-style for more information on Ralph Lauren's sustainability initiatives.
Shell: recycled polyester. Lining: recycled nylon. Fill: duck down, duck feathers. Machine washable. Imported.
